reviews.review: Берите это! Не пожалеете о выборе!

Half-Life
Este nombre hace referencia a un término científico que seria el periodo de semidesintegracion o semivida
Es el tiempo necesario para que un elemento radioactivo pierda la mitad de su masa por desintegracion natural.

Con esa informacion vas a poder entender un poco de que se habla durante el transcurso del juego. Otra perspectiva de lo que vas a ver.

detalle de maxima importancia: la banda sonora pega perfectamente con todo el estilo del juego y el doblaje a español es hecho por la misma empresa que hizo el doblaje de "Control". Recomiendo totalemente disfrutalo en ingles.

gra mimo swojego wieku (około 20 lat) dalej trzyma poziom i może fabułą dorównywać nawet takim tytułom jak "the forest" "left 4 dead" "dying light" czy nawet serii gier "GTA".

Grafika - 7/10
Grywalność - 9/10
Wymagania sprzętowe - 2/10 (gra jest dość stara dzięki czemu uciągniecie ją nawet na najszłabszym sprzęcie)
Fabuła - 8/10
Przedział wiekowy - 10+ (gra posiada co prawda drobne ilości krwi oraz zabijanie lecz nie jest to pokazane w brutalny sposób tak jak w grach z dzisiejszych czasów gdzie krew leje się wiadrami)

Ogólna ocena z mojej strony - 9/10 polecam grę każdemu!
this game made me fall in love with gaming.

Данная игра является для меня чем-то супер личным. В основном потому, что эта одна из самых первых игр, в которые я поиграл. А вообще, это первая игра с серьезным сюжетом. До этого я знал только тетрис и какие-то другие головоломки.
Тут особо нечего говорить - халф лайф это культовая игра. Не то чтобы она была идеальной, но она хорошо сбалансирована, а главное первая в своем роде.
Story is awesome, Gameplay is fun, Worth the price. 9.5/10
this is a god like game. ps I love this game

i get why people like this game. For its time, this game would have been revolutionary, and this is obvious even today when revisiting its physics and world.

Uma experiencia sem igual, principalmente na época de seu lançamento, e mesmo hoje, após tantos anos ainda impressiona com a jogabilidade e a criatividade na produção desse clássico. Recomendado a todos que gostam de uma estória enigmática combinada com uma jogabilidade perfeita. Quase que uma obrigação a todo jogador terminar esse título.

Лучшей физики, минимальных требований но при том отличной картинки в другой игре не найти. Отличный сюжет. Действительно легендарная игра, легендарной серии. При отличном качестве ее можно запустить на утюге (образно). Вот чему надо поучится современным игроделам. Игра отличная и актуальная как для олдфагов так и для молодых геймеров.

It acts as if the first game didn't happen. The characters are boring and Gordon is treated more than just a vessel for the player to experience the game when he is anything but. Gordon's whole job in the first game was to get in the teleporter, he wasn't a scientist. We see more people like Gordon in Xen - stuck for god knows how long, either bled out or starved to death. Oh yeah, they took Xen out of the game because now we can teleport easily without having to go through such tribulations somehow. Is it explained how? No, of course not. This was a problem in the first game and it sure is a problem in this one: Stuff happens and you are just meant to accept it as gospel and not question how it happened. If they ever make a Half-Life 3, I am pretty sure they won't answer any questions from this game. Xen was a fun place, some sections might have been a bit frustrating but you just had to get better at jumping. Lack of it really 
Set-pieces overstay their welcome. Riding a boat/car while being chased by a helicopter for 10-20 minutes is acceptable, 40 minutes? Not so much. Same with the gravity gun. It's fun to use gravity gun for a while but it always go back to "hey use the gravity gun instead of the interact/use because we want to showcase the physics". Source engine is a solid engine and it still looks decent and physics are better than most AAA games coming out today but it isn't enough to carry the game on its own. There's no new enemy types (and no, the new variation of headcrabs aren't new enemies, just a slightly different versions of headcrabs) in fact they took out majority of the enemies from the game. Guns aren't as interesting as the first game's weaponry either. The only cool weapon is the Pulse Rifle. 
All of these I could partially ignore if the next problem wasn't there: game takes control away from you too many times, too often and too long just so it could serve some half-assed story that isn't interesting. Half-Life 1 had this oppressive atmosphere of being in an old military base/new scientific base to develop weapons and military tech, this is just another lifeless, soulless city.
Half-Life 2 isn't a bad game, just an unreasonably bad sequel that takes away mechanics instead of building on them.

me gusto pero lo malo que el pepe.

This game is phenomenal, I haven't been able to thoroughly enjoy a game for such a long time and playing throughout this entire game was an absolute pleasure. The story was amazing, the gameplay is simplistic and engaging. I was quite shocked that I hadn't played this game earlier on during the early life time of Half Life 2. If you have any spare money left in your bank or Steam wallet sitting around, I would suggest investing it in purchasing this game. I can guarantee you will have a blast of a time playing the whole of this, it's an amazing experience.
I don't like this game, I heard so much about it and the story it's not even interesting, I gave it a chance but it's not worthy it.
А хуй его знает зачем купил, все равно не играю))))
One of the best games ever.

Продолжение культовой игры Half-Life просто замечательна. Несмотря на то, что этой игре много лет, графика в ней шикарна. Очень хороший и продуманный сюжет. Игра встречает новой физикой для того времени. Также хорошо проработаны персонажи игры. Хоть я играл в неё недолго, но я её прошёл всю, и остался очень доволен. Я не жалею, что купил все части этой игры!
